data.title: Eğil Barajı Kamp Alanı
data.meta_description: You can visit Egil Dam for a fascinating camping experience that you will remember for a long time.
data.text:
You can visit Egil Dam for a fascinating camping experience that you will remember for a long time. Egil Dam, located in Diyarbakir's Eğil district, is located behind the city. Some houses in the region were built towards the upper part of the dam. You can feel yourself in the charming streets of the Aegean or Mediterranean, thanks to a city architecture created by the municipality with white colors. Egil Dam is known as a popular excursion route for both summer and winter seasons. Especially in the summer season, you can find the opportunity to try many nature sports around the dam. You can go to the campground, which is 45 km from Diyarbakır city center and a few minutes' walk from Eğil district center, by using private vehicles and public transportation. First of all, if you are coming by private car, you can proceed in the direction of Ergani and turn right at 11 kilometers of the road. Then, when you continue the road straight, you can reach Egil district. If you are going to use public transportation, you can prefer the district minibuses, which have regular services from Diyarbakır city terminal to Eğil.

Egil Dam promises a peaceful and quiet atmosphere to its guests who come for camping and picnic. Moreover, thanks to the proximity of the camp site to the dam and the district center, you can easily meet many of your needs. You can see the picnic area and fresh fish restaurants by the Egil Dam. In addition, you can meet your needs such as toilet, electricity or food and beverage from the social facilities established around the dam. When you come to Eğil Dam Camping Area, you should definitely have a barbecue in the picnic area surrounded by pine trees, which has a magnificent nature. For this, you can easily obtain barbecue materials from Eğil district center. Moreover, if you come to Eğil Dam Camping by a private vehicle, you can also take advantage of the picnic area parking lot.

You can spend time with interesting activities such as boat tour, jet ski and safari at the Eğil Dam Campground, where countless guests flock to, summer and winter. We can also say that when winter comes and the mountains turn white, photography around the dam will be very enjoyable. You can also do activities such as yoga and meditation that will relax your soul at the Eğil Dam Campground, where you will have a quiet and calm camping experience. Finally, you can go on a nature walk where you will discover the fascinating beauty of the region and witness the hidden historical beauties of Turkey.
